testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "Sara" and last name "Omar".......................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "Test12345@test.com" field.............................passed And user enter company name.................................................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" and "P@ssw0rd"....................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | user should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: user login with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed When user enter "Test12345@test.com" and "P@ssw0rd".........................passed Then user click on login button.............................................passed And user could login successfully and go to home page.......................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | user should be able to login to the system

testcase.classname: F03_PasswordRecovery | User could reset password successfully
testcase.name: User could reset the password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed And user click on forgot password...........................................passed Then user fill email with valid email.......................................passed And user click on Recover button............................................passed Then user should see message................................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Currency | user could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: Logged User could switch between currencies
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to homepage.............................................passed When user change current currency to Euro...................................passed Then user should found all products prices in Euro..........................passed When user change current currency to Dollar.................................passed Then user should found all products prices in Dollar........................passed
